actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the continuation of the President's authority to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for the granting of most-favored-nation status to Romania.

summary.text: Disapproves the extension of the President's authority, under the Trade Act of 1974, to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for the granting of most favored nation status to Romania.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the continuation of the President's authority to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for the granting of most-favored-nation status to Romania.
